tweets.text: I would like to see the @EnvAgency & @DefraGovUK call some scientific experts in to solve the issue. I can’t believe the country who cracked the covid vaccine can’t find a solution to this. Get the right people on the job @MPGeorgeEustice @MattHancock @JamesBevanEA #StopTheStink https://t.co/r86foTUlcL
@Robbie_Watt @WoollyMaggot @EnvAgency Might be long term, but woodland creation should be considered as both reduction and removal as timber could be used to replace more C emission heavy materials

Yes - so much more than an ‘odour’ - irritates me to keep hearing that word as if it’s just a slightly inconvenient whiff. It’s poisonous landfill gas causing unbearable health effects on a daily basis @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink @EnvAgency https://t.co/vpSObEHFeY

tweets.text: Come on @EnvAgency we all know it has been here for years in homes!! It’s just travelling further because you failed to act on complaints! People gave up! Even in February a review said no odour! Close it down! @StinkStopthe #corrupt @MattHancock @HMSQNLZ https://t.co/XnFVnydF11

urls.description: Entfernt Bakterien, Legionellen und Biofilm aus Ihrer Praxis, MVZ und Ihren Wasser führenden Leitungen. Jetzt einen kostenlosen Beratungstermin vereinbaren.

tweets.text: Solidarity with our friends over the https://t.co/RpIxo0KiCN admissions due to landfill fumes-can’t believe this isn’t a one off-the @EnvAgency s involved are responsible the annihilation of our environment& wrecking the lives&health of so many people @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/qtjchejh6D

After being convicted&jailed as a result of criminal activity in the waste industry you’d think a person would be banned from positions of responsibility in that industry again @EnvAgency You need to justify why you allowed a convicted criminal to operate a dangerous landfill https://t.co/pwErtF70TH

We can now see it’s not the @EnvAgency being scared of an orphaned site , they’re scared of footing the bill to restore it . It’s a case of The EA with no money , red with no interest and us in the middle with no quality of life . @StinkStopthe

The @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA definitely need more money, they’re saying they’ve no money to monitor the landfill longer term - we’ve not even solved the fumes yet so this is v v concerning! I don’t buy the due diligence tho, he was already known to them @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/O0evVeHSDu
@MrMarkwarren1 @SianieRoo @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @Cap_it_off @MPGeorgeEustice More money for environmental regulation and enforcement so that they can actually monitor things and do due diligence?

tweets.text: Public enquiry response needed @MPGeorgeEustice The country needs to learn lessons from this & the @EnvAgency need to be held to account @DefraGovUK @MattHancock #stopthestink https://t.co/Ynunmnkdae

Well said!! @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA also to any media outlets that use the phrase ‘stinkiest town’ or ‘smelly’ please replace with ‘odour from poisonous gas’. please don’t trivialise it by saying it’s a smell. The poisonous gas smells. K. Cool. 👍🏽 https://t.co/qVtEy6wxES

tweets.text:
Let’s talk hydrogen sulphide. 

An average landfill at maximum emits around an average of 3-5ugm3 at its peak.  

Walleys quarry emitted 202ugm3.  A mere 40 times higher.  

 @EnvAgencyMids @DefraGovUK @BorisJohnson @CHEMTrust @MattHancock 
#StopTheStink https://t.co/7wFYZmphcm

@ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgencyMids Is this acceptable? #StopTheStink https://t.co/lU46Hl7sBg
Cap it off. Make it clean. Grow some trees. Make it green @EnvAgency @MPGeorgeEustice @MattHancock @DefraGovUK @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency #stopthestink https://t.co/nWCFdCtk7W

@tw33tie1 @EnvAgencyMids I suspect failure to manage the surface water has been a major contributor. As large amounts of water percolate through the heap, they will carry organic matter particles into the older parts of the heap where there is (legally) more gypsum, triggering the strong H2S production.
@DrMickSalt @EnvAgencyMids Thank you for the updates and information. Still curious as to what actions led to the sudden escalation of H2S production and release.

They’ve changed their name but the stink stays the same @WalleysQuarry previously called @RedIndustries2 https://t.co/O7iC0CG1SZ

Totally agree, it's like they turn the gas tap on at our front door & top us up with hydrogen sulphide I until all the  oxygen has gone, comes in thick & fast, doesn't leave, repulsive toxic landfill pollution from walleys quarry was @RedIndustries2 https://t.co/AWqtMT9O5k

@DrMickSalt @EnvAgencyMids @AaronBell4NUL Thanks! I'm in my 4th year & learned this surprise the hard way (though, in the end, it helped w/ reducing impostor syndrome). Unfortunately I've had to take a leave of absence from my studies because of Walleys Quarry, but I'm hoping to resume in July & complete early next year.

@DrMickSalt @Regenerate_SOT @EnvAgencyMids Thank you for sharing screenshots! I suspected it would all come down to money and budget cuts by the Tory gov. @AaronBell4NUL, can you clarify what you meant by 'good news' at the #StopTheStink protest on Monday? This news is not good.

@SianieRoo @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @Cap_it_off Yes, that is probably a combination of things (tho don't underestimate the power of doing the easy thing when there is no time). What is happening in Silverdale is not isolated either. There's raw sewage going into a river in Cornwall, not to mention the landfill issues elsewhere

tweets.text: When will Scottish Gov get a grip on regulation and enforcement for salmon farms? Mowi is fined $450k for salmon escape in Norway. When almost double that number escape from Mowi farm off Barra, the company just gets a gentle letter from Marine Scotland... https://t.co/WfPrF7sS5Y https://t.co/SRPSvj5EB2

@a_merrydew @Regenerate_SOT @EnvAgencyMids @AaronBell4NUL Also, I see you are a PhD candidate. Word of advice: doing a PhD is more a measure of tenacity than intelligence. I found that out the hard way, so I thought I would share to save you the unpleasant surprises. Good luck!

Our officers have been out & about this weekend further to reports of odour from #WalleysQuarry #NewcastleUnderLyme 
 
We detected odour at numerous locations & last week issued the operator with further actions to improve its management of landfill gas as quickly as possible. https://t.co/zoXM4W2yrW

@BenM_Anderson @SianieRoo @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @Cap_it_off @MPGeorgeEustice The cost to health is worth it!

Silverdale has seen a tide of pollution over the last 7 months  &  its going to get worse!

It's now take take take & destroy our Greenbelt that has given us Village status, it comes down to nothing but greed!

Health will suffer costing millions!
@a_merrydew @Regenerate_SOT @EnvAgencyMids The EA won’t publish minutes, this was a very informal meeting to check that my ideas passed the “giggle test”. Stand by, I have an idea.

We've taken the first step in developing our carbon offsetting strategy.

Our latest research sets out the different approaches to carbon offsetting, and the challenges and opportunities they present.

Read more on our blog: https://t.co/6VCLjJkyhK

#NetZero #EA2025 https://t.co/dHsr9mKQYv
We've had a couple of good days around ours, but we know that another area is getting it instead of us. And that the residents of Silverdale can't escape it.  #stopthestink https://t.co/PiEg7QPGsI

Today's Queen's Speech confirms the Government will publish its plan for sewer overflows within 16 months. 
It needs to include public consultation & scrutiny in the process. We pay our water company bills which means we should have a voice. #QueensSpeech
https://t.co/r8nnRKb2Oy

Breaking News . @EnvAgency have sanctioned the destruction of breeding birds tomorrow at the Lower Otter Restoration Project . This is #HS2 part 2 . PLEASE THINK AGAIN @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest Please follow @WiseBirding and RT https://t.co/I8Wv40YKqy
